tags: Heating equipment and parts and accessories
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: NWS BTU Heater Replacement**
------------------------------------------

The Department of National Defence invites bids for the replacement of BTU heaters at 22 Wing CFB North Bay, Building 109, Hornell Heights, ON, Canada P0H 1P0.

**Procurement Details:**

*   Solicitation Number: W8485-237584/B
*   Amendment Number: 1
*   Publication Date: 2023-05-25
*   Tender Closing Date: 2023-06-09T14:00:00
*   Amendment Date: 2023-06-09
*   Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-06-16
*   Expected Contract End Date: 2023-08-31

**Goods and Services:**

*   Items 1 to 5 as described in the bid solicitation (attached documents)

**Delivery Locations:**

*   22 Wing CFB North Bay, Building 109, Hornell Heights, ON, Canada P0H 1P0

**Indigenous Business Requirements:**

*   This procurement is conditionally set-aside under the Federal Government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.
*   If two or more Indigenous businesses submit responsive bids, the procurement will be set aside, and only Indigenous firms who submitted a bid will be assessed.

**Trade Agreements:**

*   This bid solicitation is open to suppliers who are signatories to the following trade agreements:
    *   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    *   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    *   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    *   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
    *   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contracting Entity:**

*   Department of National Defence
*   101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON, CA K1A 0K2

**Contact Information:**

*   Fawaz Awan,  Fawaz.Awan@forces.gc.ca, (819) 939
